name: Antiquarian
entries: You are an expert in establishing the provenance, antiquity, value, and function of objects and discoveries.

items: Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) and Intelligence ({@skill History}) checks when trying to learn information about an item.
You can spend 1 minute studying an object to replicate the effects of the {@spell identify|phb} spell on it.
